scripts.pre:dev: npm run prisma-setup && cross-env NODE_ENV=development npx prisma db push && node ./scripts/copy-schema-to-app-side.js && npm run format && npm run typecheck
scripts.dev: npm run pre:dev && PORT=3235 tsx watch ./src/index.ts
scripts.dev-test: POSTGRESQL_ADDON_URI=postgres://postgres:postgres@localhost:5432/zacharietest npm run prisma-setup && cross-env NODE_ENV=test POSTGRESQL_ADDON_URI=postgres://postgres:postgres@localhost:5432/zacharietest npx prisma db push && NODE_ENV=test POSTGRESQL_ADDON_URI=postgres://postgres:postgres@localhost:5432/zacharietest tsx ./scripts/populate-test-db.ts && NODE_ENV=test POSTGRESQL_ADDON_URI=postgres://postgres:postgres@localhost:5432/zacharietest PORT=3291 tsx watch ./src/index.ts
scripts.dev-test-short: NODE_ENV=test POSTGRESQL_ADDON_URI=postgres://postgres:postgres@localhost:5432/zacharietest tsx ./scripts/populate-test-db.ts && NODE_ENV=test POSTGRESQL_ADDON_URI=postgres://postgres:postgres@localhost:5432/zacharietest PORT=3291 tsx watch ./src/index.ts
scripts.dev-cronjobs: npm run prisma-setup && cross-env NODE_ENV=development npx prisma db push && node ./scripts/copy-schema-to-app-side.js && npm run pre:dev && tsx watch ./src/cronjobs/index.ts
scripts.start: cross-env NODE_ENV=production npm run prisma-setup && npm run prisma-deploy && PORT=8080 tsx ./src/index.ts
scripts.start-local: cross-env NODE_ENV=development npm run prisma-setup && npm run prisma-deploy && PORT=3235 tsx ./src/index.ts
scripts.start-cronjobs: cross-env NODE_ENV=production npm run prisma-setup && npm run prisma-deploy && tsx ./src/cronjobs/index.ts
scripts.prisma-reset-db: rm -rf prisma/migrations && npx prisma migrate reset --force && npm run prisma-setup
